description: PodAttachOptions is the query options to a Pod's remote attach call

Stderr.description: Stderr if true indicates that stderr is to be redirected for the attach call

Stdin.description: Stdin if true indicates that stdin is to be redirected for the attach call

Stdout.description: Stdout if true indicates that stdout is to be redirected for the attach call

TTY.description: TTY if true indicates that a tty will be allocated for the attach call
